metadata.Title: CVE-2014-8172 on Ubuntu 16.04 ESM (xenial) - medium
metadata.Description:
The filesystem implementation in the Linux kernel before 3.13 performscertain operations on lists of files with an inappropriate lockingapproach, which allows local users to cause a denial of service (softlockup or system crash) via unspecified use of Asynchronous I/O (AIO)operations.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2014-8172` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

linux-image-4.4.0-211-generic - 4.2.0-16.19
linux-image-unsigned-4.4.0-211-generic - 4.2.0-16.19
linux-image-unsigned-4.4.0-211-lowlatency - 4.2.0-16.19
Available with Ubuntu Pro (Infra-only): https://ubuntu.com/pro

linux-image-4.2.0-1013-raspi2 - 4.2.0-1013.19
No subscription required

linux-image-4.4.0-1012-snapdragon - 4.4.0-1012.12
No subscription required

linux-image-4.4.0-1129-aws - 4.4.0-1001.10
Available with Ubuntu Pro (Infra-only): https://ubuntu.com/pro
